comment.author: 36196524@N08
comment._content: The station sign-board doesn't appear to be long enough to bear such a long name.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/36196524@N08] Well spotted! I looked at a larger version and indeed it reads "Balgownie" not "Fairy Meadow". I've replaced this version with a larger version for everyone to see. Our caption does read "Fairy Meadow (Balgownie) Railway Station". To quote from the Wollongong City Library website "Balgownie residents frequently used the railway station that was first opened on the 3rd October 1888 as 'Para Meadow'; the name was changed to 'Balgownie' in 1909 and then the name 'Fairy Meadow' was adopted in 1956." Thank you. AB

comment.author: 60255752@N06
comment._content: I'd date this as the late 1940s to early 1950s from the clothes.
